title: Resource pack information
description: Information about a resource pack for Minecraft

pack_format.title: Resource pack version
pack_format.description: This will be 1 for pre-1.9 versions, 2 for 1.9-1.10 and 3 in 1.11 and 1.12

description.title: Pack description
description.description: The description for this pack. Any text which doesn't fit on two lines will be removed

language.title: Custom languages
language.description: Each sub-object is the internal code for the language, which the pack's lang folder has a language file with the name <code>.lang

name.title: Language name
name.description: The displayed name of the custom language, e.g. English

region.title: Language Region
region.description: The place where this version of the language is spoken (area or country). E.g. United Kingdom

bidirectional.title: RTL support?
bidirectional.description: When true, the language reads right to left
